tool_description: Analyzes stock levels across product categories, providing category-wise inventory insights, trends, and performance metrics for strategic decision making.

category_ids.description: List of product category IDs to analyze

analysis_period_days.description: Number of days to analyze for trends (1-365)

include_value_analysis.description: Include monetary value analysis along with unit counts

min_stock_threshold.description: Minimum stock level for flagging low inventory

error_messages: Invalid category ID: One or more category IDs do not exist in the system.
Analysis period out of range: Period must be between 1 and 365 days.
Insufficient data: Not enough historical data for meaningful trend analysis.
Category limit exceeded: Maximum 50 categories can be analyzed at once.
Invalid threshold values: min_stock_threshold must be positive, trend_sensitivity must be between 0.1 and 2.0.
usage: Provide category_ids to analyze stock across categories. Set analysis_period_days for trend depth, use warehouse_filter to limit scope. Enable include_value_analysis for monetary insights.
